org.jasig.cas.adaptors.duo

Class DuoAuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.adaptors.duo.DuoAuthenticationService

  • @Component(value="duoAuthenticationService")
public final class DuoAuthenticationService
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction that encapsulates interaction with Duo 2fa authentication service via its public API.
    Since:
    4.2
